clauses.title: License Grant
clauses.summary: Grants non-exclusive license to use software for internal business purposes

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.summary: Annual payment due within 30 days of invoice date

clauses.title: Termination Clause
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 90 days written notice

clauses.title: Data Security
clauses.summary: Vendor must maintain SOC 2 Type II compliance

insights.title: Auto-renewal clause present
insights.description: Contract will automatically renew unless notice is given 90 days prior to expiration

insights.title: Review usage metrics
insights.description: Consider negotiating volume discounts based on actual usage patterns

evidence.snippet: This Agreement shall commence on December 15, 2023 and continue for a period of one (1) year...
The parties agree to modify Section 4.2 regarding payment terms...
As discussed, the auto-renewal clause will take effect unless written notice...
